Comment.Language: From the Feast of the Ascension of our Lord to the 49th day of the Pentecost Period:

Text.Language: All/louia: all/louia. Pi,~rictoc aftwnf e~bolqen n/eymwout: ouoh afsenaf e~p~swi e~niv/oui: afhemci caouinam m~Pefiwt: all/louia: all/louia.
Alleluia, Alleluia. Christ is risen from the dead and has ascended into the heavens, and is seated at the right hand of His Father. Alleluia, Alleluia.
الليلويا الليلويا المسيح قام من الأموات، وصعد إلي السموات وجلس عن يمين ابيه، الليلويا الليلويا.
